ThingDef.description: Daniell Cell is the first cell to be produced commecially. Very low capacity. Can charge partially

ThingDef.description: Daniel cell is the first cell to be produced commecially. Very low capacity.

ThingDef.description: Lead Acid stuff.

ThingDef.label: LeadAcidLarge
ThingDef.description: Lead Acid Battery, large variant.

ThingDef.description: Highest capacity lithium ion battery.

ThingDef.description: Highest capacity lithium ion battery. Large variant.

ThingDef.description: Highest capacity lithium ion battery. Portable variation. Suitable for caravans.

ThingDef.label: Nickel Iron
ThingDef.description: First type of Nickel-based rechargeable batteries. Has a hugh operating temperature range. High heat capacity, but has a slow charge rate.

ThingDef.description: Nickel-Iron battery. Large variant.

ThingDef.description: Nickel-Iron Battery. Medium Extra variant.

ThingDef.label: Nickel Iron Large Extra
ThingDef.description: Nickel Iron. Large Extra variant.

ThingDef.label: Zinc Air
ThingDef.description: Zinc air, is primary battery. Super high capacity, high self discharge rate, heat resistant, low power output.

ThingDef.description: zinc-air battery. Large variant.
